channel.title: Happy Birthday on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Happy Birthday on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Remembering that it's your happy birthday
item.description: Periodically I look at the sorts of tools that you can use to remember that it's someone's birthday. Here's the current things that put birthday reminders in front of me every day. The 10,000 lb. gorilla of birthdays is Facebook, which offers a nice simple interface to send a one-line birthday greeting. You could visit Facebook daily just for birthdays and not much more, and be reasonably satisfied with the results.
